issue.title: [Java] Support compare and search operation for BaseRepeatedValueVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6080](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6080). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support comparison & search for sub-classes of BaseRepeatedValueVector.
